about:
Seasoned experts with 5+ years of experience in the web & blockchain development and rich knowledge from low-level to high-level languages.

Proficient in developing full stack web applications across multiple platforms using best programming languages for web development like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, Vue, Typescript, PHP, Ruby, Python, Java, NodeJS and Solidity.

Rich experience in implementing of AWS solutions and strong understanding of different development methodologies such as Agile and TDD.
